moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Growth
moves.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Ingrain
moves.description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

moves.name: Synthesis
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Clear Smog
moves.description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

moves.name: Rage Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

moves.name: Spore
moves.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.
